articles.author: Rachael Bunyan
articles.title: 'Friends' co-creator Marta Kauffman apologizes for lack of black leads in the hit sitcom - Daily Mail
articles.description: Marta Kauffman has pledged $4 million to the Boston area's Brandeis University, to create an endowed professorship in the university's African and African American studies department.
articles.content:
'Friends' co-creator Marta Kauffman has once again apologized for the lack of black leads on the legendary New York-based sitcom. 
In response to the lack of diversity on the show, Kauffman has pled… [+7321 chars]
